channel.title: Can't play games in either moparscape or Silab
channel.description:
i cant play using either Moparscape or Silab, it just gets stuck saying [u]loading - please wait[/u] :mad: it kinda sucks because its my server and there are no tutorials on how to make clients
Ive broken it down to my character alone, only my character gets this regardless of computer

item.title: Can't play games in either moparscape or Silab
item.dc:creator: @kmansnoob kmansnoob
item.description:
@kmansnoob wrote:

It’s because the server is making the client load stuff it doesn’t even have.

So yes you need a new client.

Read full topic
item.source: Can't play games in either moparscape or Silab

item.title: Can't play games in either moparscape or Silab
item.dc:creator: @Zillionair1 Zillionair1
item.description:
@Zillionair1 wrote:

There are tuts on making a client, you just haven’t used “Search” at the top right corner

Read full topic
